body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear, ADDPET 2K Dual Dash Camera for Cars, Dashcam with 64GB SD Card, Car Camera with Night Vision, Loop Recording, Accident Lock, G-Sensor, Parking Monitor, 24 Hours Recording
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 9 mins
features: 【2.5K Front and Rear Dash Cam】 - ADDPET introduces the K21 front and rear dash cam, capable of recording in Ultra HD 2.5K (2560 x 1600P). This feature allows for clearer visibility of essential details such as road signs and vehicle license plates, enhancing your driving experience and overall safety. The dash camera is outfitted with a 170° wide-angle front camera and a 150° wide-angle waterproof rear camera, capturing everything without missing any angles.

【3-Inch IPS Screen & Aluminum Alloy Build】 - Enjoy a crystal-clear experience with the large 3-inch full HD screen. Additionally, our dash cam for cars is crafted from professional aviation-grade aluminum alloy material. In contrast to the plastic used by most sellers, our product boasts superior texture and excellent heat dissipation capabilities. The metal casing not only boosts durability but also minimizes damage during minor collisions, ensuring the recorder preserves vital footage.

【Loop Recording & Incident Lock】 - Our dash cam front and rear includes a complimentary 64GB Micro SD card that seamlessly begins and ends recording with your car's ignition. The loop recording feature automatically replaces old footage, prioritizing space for new recordings. Equipped with a built-in G-Sensor, the car camera takes charge in the event of a collision. It automatically locks and preserves the video, ensuring it won't be overwritten during subsequent loops.

【Super Night Vision & Parking Monitor】 - Our dash cam boasts a f1.8 aperture, the ISO light sensor, and advanced WDR/HDR technology for improved color accuracy and clarity. Whether it's day or night, this car dash cam excels in capturing intricate details. Furthermore, if your vehicle experiences a collision while parked or someone attempts to steal your car, the dash camera activates automatically upon detecting vibrations. This ensures continuous 24-hour protection for your vehicle.

【Powerful Multi-function Dashcam】 - The ADDPET dash cam is equipped with a reverse camera and a low frame rate recording mode. With this dash camera, you can not only monitor the road situation in front of and behind the car but also benefit from a reversing aid line for safe maneuvers in reverse. In time-lapse mode, the dashcam continuously captures photos at various intervals (1s or 2s) and compiles them into a video, significantly optimizing storage space on your SD card.

【WORRY-FREE WARRANTY】 We have a dedicated pre-sales and after-sales team. Feel free to contact us with any questions about this car dash cam, and we'll address all your inquiries and concerns. Our team offers 24/7 technical support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2K+UHD DASH CAMERA Record the road and license plates in clear 2K+UHD video, offering excellent image quality for detailed playback and the ultimate visual experience. Loop Recording In loop recording, the dash cam captures video in 1/3/5 minute segments. When the Micro SD card is full, loop recording automatically overwrites the earliest files, excluding locked videos. Emergency Lock ADDPET car dash camera with adjustable G-Sensor and advanced lenses swiftly captures emergencies, automatically locks and saves footage in the emergency folder to prevent overwriting.

Super Night Vision ADDPET 2K car dash camera combination of f1.8 aperture and WDR technology makes night shots brighter and prevents overexposure. Whether it's day or night, this car dash cam excels in capturing intricate details. Parking Monitor Parking surveillance mode automatically records protected video upon collision detection. For 24-hour parking recording, use the voltage drop cable with a hardwire kit to power the car recorder in normal mode. (Hardwire kit required) 310° Wide Angle Featuring a 170° front camera and a 140° rear camera, this dash cam allows for simultaneous monitoring of the vehicle's front and rear, maximizing road coverage. It significantly improves night vision and delivers clear, crisp images and videos.
